channel.title: elroyjetson tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from elroyjetson.

item.description: It's 2022 and I am still forced to print documents to feed bureaucracy. The future is still not here. I keep waiting. https://t.co/5LigLOiV3y
Too bad Windows Phone failed. I still believe it had the best user experience and such a fresh design. https://t.co/OfIwv3ltyY

@wincent I often try to migrate to Apple Numbers, which is a really nice application when you understand it, but the features of Google Sheets just keep me going back. The ability to work on it from any platform and share it with anyone is too compelling.
